text: Supplier resolves High Risk incidents within 30 days
notes: Supplier SLA too weak compared to industry norms and Customer expectations of 1 day

text: Supplier resolves Medium Risk incidents within 60 days
notes: Supplier SLA too slow; Customer requires 5 days

text: Supplier resolves Low Risk incidents within 90 days
notes: Supplier SLA too slow; Customer requires 30 days

text: Supplier sets its own unilateral response timelines
notes: Unacceptable unilateral SLA control by supplier

text: Supplier is not obligated to meet specific timeframes
notes: Missing SLA deadlines is high operational risk
Major legal risk; sensitive data not protected
High risk especially for customer data processing
Customer not protected from supplier wrongdoing
Customer cannot verify compliance, major governance risk
High legal exposure due to unlimited or undefined liability
Supplier may not have coverage for operational/tech risks

text: Indemnity limited only to willful misconduct
notes: Too narrow; should include negligence and breach

text: Supplier indemnity obligations missing or vague
notes: Customer not protected from third-party claims
High risk if data protection is involved

text: Supplier limits liability to extremely low cap
notes: Unacceptable liability cap; customer exposure high
Very risky; standard contracts include negligence
High risk if confidentiality is essential
High contractual and regulatory risk

text: Confidentiality clause is too generic or weak
notes: No obligations for technical/organizational measures
Critical for compliance

text: Supplier does not agree to follow customer instructions on data
notes: GDPR/DP compliance risk

text: No reference to regulatory compliance obligations
notes: Legal compliance risk
Customer cannot verify compliance
One-sided in supplier favor

text: Supplier does not maintain minimum insurance coverage
notes: Could result in uninsured losses

notes: Customer cannot validate coverage

text: Scope vague or not tied to measurable deliverables
notes: Execution and expectation mismatch
